message: we should probably make it more obvious

okay, nm, the create group button only appears when you go to the home page... should creating groups be more readily accessible? or would that just encourage group proliferation? (which might not be desirable)
@djchall sorry if it's a bit hidden
@leah: see above.... there may be advantages to not making it _too_ easy
now the feature I want is to be able to move this topic into the "Feedback" group
